---
title: "Speedy tomato soup"
date: "2024-09-19"
categories: [easy]
---

This is a very fast homemade tomato soup.

It only takes about 20 minutes to make, and uses only pantry staples.
Serve with grilled cheese.


---

::: aside

Lightly adapted from: [Serious Eats](https://www.seriouseats.com/no-cook-blender-tomato-soup-recipe)

:::


- olive oil
- 1/2 a small onion, diced
- 1 clove garlic, minced
- 28oz whole tomatoes (higher quality is better...)
- 1-2 cups stock or water
- crushed red pepper
- oregano
- 1 tsp Worchestershire sauce or a few anchovies or soy sauce or all
- 1 slice bread
- salt to taste

---

1. Saute the onion in the olive oil on low until it softens, about 5 minutes.
Add the garlic for 30 seconds more.
1. Add the tomatoes, stock, and spices to taste. Heat to a simmer.
1. Add the Worchestershire sauce and other umami components to taste.
1. Add the bread, torn into small pieces. 
1. Blend the whole thing with an imersion blender, salt to taste, and serve.
